formulas.name: default_UsiaPemohon
formulas.expression: IF( ISBLANK( {!recordId.Date_of_Birth__c}) , NULL , IF( DATE( 2000 , MONTH( {!recordId.Date_of_Birth__c}) , DAY( {!recordId.Date_of_Birth__c}) ) <= DATE( 2000 , MONTH( TODAY() ) , DAY( TODAY() ) ), YEAR (TODAY()) - YEAR ( {!recordId.Date_of_Birth__c}), YEAR (TODAY()) - YEAR ( {!recordId.Date_of_Birth__c}) -1 ) )

formulas.name: formulaBirthdayForLoanInput
formulas.expression: RIGHT(TRIM({!var_Birthday}), 4) & "-" & IF(VALUE(MID(TRIM({!var_Birthday}), 4, 2)) < 10, "0" & TEXT(VALUE(MID(TRIM({!var_Birthday}), 4, 2))), TEXT(VALUE(MID(TRIM({!var_Birthday}), 4, 2)))) & "-" & IF(VALUE(LEFT(TRIM({!var_Birthday}), 2)) < 10, "0" & TEXT(VALUE(LEFT(TRIM({!var_Birthday}), 2))), TEXT(VALUE(LEFT(TRIM({!var_Birthday}), 2))))

formulas.name: Is_Not_Pass_Validation
formulas.expression: IF({!Current_Screen_Position} = 'Back', FALSE,OR(ISNULL({!NTF_Pengajuan}), ISNULL({!Rate}), {!NTF_Pengajuan} > {!Perkiraan_Harga_Asset}, {!Rate} > 22, ISBLANK({!Paket_Pembiayaan}), ISBLANK({!Jenis_Aset}), ISNULL({!Kepemilikan_Asset}), ISNULL({!Perkiraan_Harga_Asset}), ISNULL({!NJOP_Terbaru}), ISNULL({!Tenor}), ISNULL({!Usia_Pemohon}), ISNULL({!Life_Insurance_Company}), ISNULL({!Perkiraan_Harga_Notaris}), AND({!Paket_Pembiayaan} = 'Non Appraisal', ISBLANK({!Luas_Bangunan})), AND({!Paket_Pembiayaan} = 'Non Appraisal', ISBLANK({!Jumlah_Lantai})), AND({!Paket_Pembiayaan} = 'Non Appraisal', ISBLANK({!Lebar_Jalanan_Depan_Asset_3m})), AND({!Paket_Pembiayaan} = 'Non Appraisal', ISBLANK({!Nilai_Pertanggungan_Asuransi_Kebakaran}))))
